text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Several weeks have passed since I<n>began watching over
Mihono<n>Bourbon's secret training.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant.
choice_data_list: Hang in there! Just a bit more to go!
Hang in there! Just a bit more to go!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Haaah... New personal... best!
choice_data_list: You did a great job!
You did a great job!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for your support. Upon full<n>recovery of stamina, I
will transition to<n>the interval training workout. Now<n>moving
to the ramped track.
choice_data_list: Let's add an extra lap starting today.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Understood. Adjusting plan to include<n>modifications.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Stamina recharged. Commencing<n>ramped dash.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mihono Bourbon races off without<n>another word. Despite
the strenuous<n>training, she never reveals any hint of<n>
weakness.
choice_data_list:
(From a trainer's perspective, there's no doubt
that she's more naturally suited to sprint
distances. And yet...)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Witnessing the strength and tenacity<n>in her run, a sense of
pride wells up<n>inside of me.
choice_data_list: (Chase your dreams, Mihono Bourbon!)

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's only a matter of time before<n>she's ready for medium
and long<n>distances... Only one obstacle<n>remains.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
So you're the one who's been giving<n>her endurance
lessons behind my<n>back.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One day, the changes in Mihono<n>Bourbon's condition catch
her<n>trainer's eye. After putting two and<n>two together, he
calls me out.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
This person is not involved with my<n>evening runs. I have
been doing<n>everything by my own will.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Bourbon, you really think I'm going to<n>believe that when
you two have been<n>meeting every night? I bet this trainer<n>
took pity on you.
choice_data_list: What? It's not like that...

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Listen, I've heard all about her lofty<n>goals. But you and me
both, we know<n>the risks involved. Do you really think<n>I'm
going to let her run those races?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
If I may object, my entire purpose for<n>enrolling here is the
Triple Crown. I will<n>not accept anything less.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Exasperated by her stubbornness,<n>the trainer lets out a long
sigh.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
...Fine. Then show me if you've got<n>what it takes. The
Kikuka Sho is 3,000<n>meters. Let's see you run that<n>
distance right now.
choice_data_list: (She can't handle that kind of distance yet!)

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Understood.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I will prove my abilities to you.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: We move to the course for MihonoBourbon's 3,000-meter attempt.However, at her current level, I'm notsure she can finish, let alone finishfast.
choice_data_list: (I hope she'll be okay...)

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
(1,600 meters completed on time.<n>1,400 meters remain.
Irregular air<n>intake detected. Unable to maintain a<n>steady
pace...)

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Agh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
My gut was right. Around the 2,000<n>meter mark, Mihono
Bourbon's speed<n>starts decreasing. It's all but a crawl<n>by
the time she reaches the finish line.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant...

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Just give up already. Stop doing this<n>to yourself. You're not
built for long<n>distances.
choice_data_list:
(It's true that long-distance races aren't her
forte. But still...)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After spending several weeks with<n>Mihono Bourbon,
anyone can see<n>how determined she is to participate<n>in
the Classic Triple Crown series.
choice_data_list: I think we should respect her wishes.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Can't you see that all she's doing is<n>hurting herself? Why
is it so hard for<n>you to understand?
choice_data_list: But—

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Ugh never mind, there's no point in<n>talking to you. Bourbon,
tell us how<n>you feel. I'm sure you understood the<n>reality
of the situation when you were<n>running.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: How I "feel"...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A hesitant Mihono Bourbon opens<n>her mouth to speak.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...The Triple Crown is non-negotiable.<n>This is one objective I
must see to the<n>end.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Please understand that I cannot give<n>up now.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
...If that's what you want, then so be<n>it. I can't stand by
your decision in<n>good faith. Our training contract ends<n>
today.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ... ...I understand.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
...I had high expectations of you,<n>Bourbon. You've
disappointed me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Shaking his head, the trainer turns on<n>his heels and leaves.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
choice_data_list: ...Hey, are you okay?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I am currently experiencing<n>"confusion" due to the loss of
my<n>trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
It is true that despite my<n>supplementary training, I was
unable<n>to run 3,000 meters.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I've based all my projections upon<n>the Triple Crown. Have
I been<n>miscalculating my whole racing<n>career?
choice_data_list:
I have faith in you. You have what it takes to
succeed.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her perseverance to put herself<n>through such demanding
training<n>without a single complaint is no small<n>feat.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rather, it's a testament to Mihono<n>Bourbon's willpower
and her desire<n>to achieve the Classic Triple Crown.
choice_data_list:
No matter what other people say, I'm on your
side!

No matter what other people say, I'm on your
side!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
choice_data_list: We'll get to the finish line together.
We'll get to the finish line together.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Mihono Bourbon's eyes widen.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Together...
choice_data_list: I don't want you to give up.
I don't want you to give up.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: (These words... sound familiar...)

text_block_list.name: Young Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Haaah... nngh... Father... I failed...<n>again...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon's Father
text_block_list.text:
You may not have a lot of stamina.<n>But what you've got is
the heart to<n>keep going. As long as you don't<n>stop,
everything's gonna be all right.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon's Father
text_block_list.text: We'll get to the finish line together.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: (This trainer sounds just like my<n>father.)

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
choice_data_list: ...Mihono Bourbon?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Unable to bear the awkward silence<n>any longer, I grab her
attention. She<n>studies my face for a moment before<n>
speaking.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Your customized training plan allowed<n>me to achieve the
first 1,600 meters<n>today, which is more than I could<n>
manage before.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I feel that I will go far with you as my<n>trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: From now on, I am in your care.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And then, the so-called "cyborg" of<n>Tracen Academy grips
my hand<n>firmly—but warmly.
